text.div:
AC followed by Paclitaxel + Trastuzumab Course 2

Name: Paclitaxel in Dose-dense Paclitaxel (Q14D) + Trastuzumab (Q7D)

Course: 2

Agent Protocols Options:

Paclitaxel 175 mg/m^2 IV over 3 hours D1 in cycles 1-4

Offset: None

Cycle length: Q14D x 4 cycles
